column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been coming here for over 10 years now
column3: this place has been able to withstand the test of time. The ambiance is cozy
column4: comfortable and chatty - a great place to go on a date or simply to grab a bite with friends. After coming here for so many years there's a standard list of things I always order: Spicy Potatoes with Tomato Alioli
column5: Goat Cheese Baked in Tomato Sauce
column6: Â Roast Dates with Bacon & Apple Vinaigrette
column7: and Chicken & Ham Croquetas. The rest are always fun to try!
